# Artbox

```{r}
n <- 14

draw <- \(n){
  tibble(
    x = sort(runif(n)),
    y = runif(n),
    col = as.factor(as.integer(runif(n, min = 0, max = 6)))
  ) |>
    ggplot(aes(x, y, col = col, fill = col, alpha = .5)) + 
    geom_polygon(show.legend = FALSE) + 
    coord_equal() +
    scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2") + 
    scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set2")
}

draw(28)

boundary <- tibble(
  x = c(0,1,1,0,0),
  y = c(0,0,1,1,0)
)
```
